attributes.action: Give British born citizens the priority over social housing eg. Housing Associations
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have been on our local housing list since October 2002, and I am still waiting for somewhere to live.  I know of several immigrants who have come from eastern Europe and Africa who have been housed in a matter of weeks.  It is about time that the British Government put it's citizens before those of other countries.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
